import React from 'react'; import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = ({ onAnalyze, userStats, onStatsUpdate, onPageChange }) => { const { isDarkMode } = useTheme(); const stats = [ { title: 'Documents Analyzed', value: userStats?.documents_analyzed?.toString() || '0', icon: 'üìÑ', color: '#4CAF50' }, { title: 'Reports Generated', value: userStats?.reports_generated?.toString() || '0', icon: 'üìä', color: '#2196F3' }, { title: 'Accuracy Rate', value: '96%', icon: 'üéØ', color: '#FF9800' }, { title: 'Last Analysis', value: userStats?.last_analysis ? new Date(userStats.last_analysis).toLocaleDateString() : 'Never', icon: '‚è∞', color: '#9C27B0' }, ]; const features = [ { title: 'Document Analysis', description: 'Upload PDFs and Word documents for comprehensive AI analysis', icon: 'üîç', color: '#4CAF50', }, { title: 'Grammar Correction', description: 'Get instant grammar and style suggestions for your content', icon: '‚úèÔ∏è', color: '#2196F3', }, { title: 'Smart Summaries', description: 'Generate concise summaries of lengthy documents', icon: 'üìù', color: '#FF9800', }, { title: 'Inconsistency Detection', description: 'Identify and flag inconsistencies across your documents', icon: '‚ö†Ô∏è', color: '#F44336', }, ]; return (

Welcome back! üëã

Ready to analyze your next document?

{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}

{stat.value}

{stat.title}

))}

What can AI Analyzer do for you?

{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}

); }; export default Dashboard;
